nodes.bodyText:
This seems like a mistake with a merge. This was the first method I wrote, but then I improved it later. The state of the domain-discovery branch is correct https://github.com/sleuthkit/autopsy/blob/domain-discovery/Core/src/org/sleuthkit/autopsy/discovery/search/DiscoveryAttributes.java#L255.
You can just remove all this code.
Was there an error coming out of this code?
Woops forgot to remove that had it in for debugging before I realized the error was because I didnt have a valid grouping criteria created yet.  Will remove that.
Would probably be a good idea, will change.
Should this be a bundle message?
This looks like a cut and paste error, I think it should be FirstActivityDateAttribute()
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -693,6 +732,8 @@ public void addAttributeToResultFiles(List<Result> results, SleuthkitCase caseDb
         INTERESTING_ITEM_SET(new InterestingItemAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_interestingItem_displayName()),
         FILE_TAG(new FileTagAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_tag_displayName()),
         OBJECT_DETECTED(new ObjectDetectedAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_object_displayName()),
+        MOST_RECENT_DATE(new MostRecentActivityDateAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_mostRecentDate_displayName()),
+        FIRST_DATE(new MostRecentActivityDateAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_firstDate_displayName()),

@@ -693,6 +732,8 @@ public void addAttributeToResultFiles(List<Result> results, SleuthkitCase caseDb
         INTERESTING_ITEM_SET(new InterestingItemAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_interestingItem_displayName()),
         FILE_TAG(new FileTagAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_tag_displayName()),
         OBJECT_DETECTED(new ObjectDetectedAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_object_displayName()),

+        FIRST_DATE(new MostRecentActivityDateAttribute(), Bundle.DiscoveryAttributes_GroupingAttributeType_firstDate_displayName()),
